mapper.insert: insert into txt ( place_name, written_date, recommend, scope, member_id, text, lat, lng ) values ( #{placeName}, #{writtenDate}, #{recommend}, #{scope}, #{memberId}, #{text}, #{lat}, #{lng} )
mapper.select: select * from txt where place_name = #{placeName} and lat = #{lat} and lng = #{lng} order by recommend desc limit 1
